name: Fashion Princess DressUp ^0^
description:
Have you ever wanted to be a fashion designer?
Join this super fun game and get ready to hit the biggest runways with your great creations!
In this dress up games you have everything at your disposal: clothes in different styles, a wide variety of colors and prints, shoes, accessories and even three cuties that will be your models and you just have to pick out your favorite clothing items, then to add a little bit of color and some prints, too. Once you've finished with the creative session check out the shoes and accessories available in this game and pick out the ones that best complement the chosen outfit! Have fun!
